name: Subtitle Edit
notes: Note: After you install this, go to Options->Settings->Video Player->Download mpv lib, download it and set the video to direct3d, then choose mpv as your Video engine.
content:
files:
- subeditzip: https://github.com/SubtitleEdit/subtitleedit/releases/download/3.5.9/SE359.zip
- vlc: https://get.videolan.org/vlc/3.0.7.1/win32/vlc-3.0.7.1-win32.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/subtitleedit/SubtitleEdit.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    description: Unzipping subtitle edit
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/subtitleedit
    src: subeditzip
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Installing VLC
    executable: vlc
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing Direct3D 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet461
    description: Installing .NET 4.6.1 runtime
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
